title: BRIEF-Thomson Reuters Acquires FC Business Intelligence
text:
BRIEF-Thomson Reuters Acquires FC Business Intelligence

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 05:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Thomson Reuters Acquires FC Business Intelligence Oct 4 (Reuters) - Thomson Reuters Corp : * THOMSON REUTERS CORP - THOMSON REUTERS ACQUIRES FC BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE * THOMSON REUTERS - FC BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE WILL BE REBRANDED REUTERS EVENTS AND WILL BE OPERATED AS PART OF REUTERS NEWS DIVISION OF THOMSON REUTERS * THOMSON REUTERS CORP - TRANSACTION MARKS AN EXIT FOR UK PRIVATE EQUITY BUSINESS LDC; TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED

BRIEF-Thomson Reuters Acquires FC Business Intelligence
